com.rift.coad.lib.webservice
Class WebServiceInvoker

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.axis.handlers.BasicHandler
      org.apache.axis.providers.BasicProvider
          org.apache.axis.providers.java.JavaProvider
              org.apache.axis.providers.java.RPCProvider
                  com.rift.coad.lib.webservice.WebServiceInvoker
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, org.apache.axis.Handler
public class WebServiceInvoker
extends org.apache.axis.providers.java.RPCProvider

The web service invoker inherits from the RPCProvider and is responsible for making the final call on the web service. Doing this makes it responsible for setting the thread context loader appropriatly so that the RMI stubs can be loaded from the appropriat jars.

See Also:
Serialized Form
